CustomField.description: Captures logic expression using the fileds of the defined rule criteria as operands ( rule criteria ) For Example : if a rule had 3 criteria : Criteria 1 ( Industry = 'Banking' ) , Criteria 2 (Country='United States') , Criteria 3 (Type='Active' ) the Display Filter logic for : Criteria 1 AND Criteria 2 OR Criteria 3 would be Industry = 'Banking' AND Country='United States' OR Type='Active' During save the DisplayfilterLogic is calculated based on the value captured on the Filter_Logic value ( 1 AND 2 OR 3 ) The calcuation derives the field name of the rule criteria for the positional operators. The field is used for display purposes to the user
CustomField.label: Rule Criteria
